Message: “Happy birthday, Cerberus!”

“Ehehe~♪
Thanks so much, everyone!”
Today is my birthday.

There were tons of
presents, yummy food,
circus acts, games...

Everyone wished me
a happy birthday
and it was just so much fun!

But, the part that made me
the happiest was...

“Cerberus...
Happy birthday!”
Big Sis!

“Wooow!
They’re so sparkly and pretty!”

She handed me
the jar of magical candies
we made together.

A one-of-a-kind treasure
just for me—no, for us.

“Sorry I couldn’t make you
any candy until now.
From here on out, though,
I’ll make you candy every year!”

“Then, let’s make them
together again!
Next year,
and the year after that...
Forever and ever!”

I reached into the jar
and out came two candies
stuck together, side by side.

They kinda reminded me of
me and Big Sis.

We looked at each other
and smiled,
splitting the candy
between us.

In my hand was a candy
that was blue like Big Sis.

In hers was one
that was green like me.

As for the flavor,
it was the most gentle candy
I’d ever eaten...
with a sweetness
just like happiness—

Hehe! Big Sis,
I really do love you...
sooo much!
